name: The White Glove and the Fisherman
title: The White Glove and the Fisherman
desc: "Amongst us, there is our own justice."

skills.desc:
End Phase: Create 1 "Called In For Cleanup" and place it randomly amongst the 5 cards at the top of your deck. If this card has only 1 Usage(s) remaining, draw 1 card.
Usage(s): 2
